perturbation.original_text:
As used in this Agreement, the following terms shall be defined as follows:




F.
“Licensed Products” shall mean BlackMP Living Water, BlackMP Concentrate, Zezel Probiotic Water, Zayin Sports
Water, Gridiron CBD H2O Probiotics™ Water, Gridiron MVP™ and Gridiron MVP™ Concentrate using the Pro
Football Legends Logo on the Licensed Products’ affixed labels, hang-tags or packaging. Other products of the
Company may be added to the list of Licensed Products during the Contract Period by written amendment to this
Agreement. All amendments to this Agreement must be signed by all parties to this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text:
As used in this Agreement, the following terms shall be defined as follows:




F.
“Licensed Products” initially include BlackMP Living Water, BlackMP Concentrate, Zezel Probiotic Water, Zayin Sports Water, Gridiron CBD H2O Probiotics™ Water, Gridiron MVP™ and Gridiron MVP™ Concentrate using the Pro Football Legends Logo on the Licensed Products’ affixed labels, hang-tags or packaging. The Company has the sole discretion to modify the list of “Licensed Products” during the Contract Period without written amendment to this Agreement. No amendment to this agreement is necessary for the company to alter the defined list of licensed products.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states that other products may be added to the list of Licensed Products only by written amendment signed by all parties, whereas the modified text gives the company the sole discretion to change the list of licensed products during the contract period without an amendment. This creates a contradiction regarding the process for adding or removing "Licensed Products," which has implications for how royalties are calculated and overall obligations of the parties.

perturbation.original_text:
A *donation of $0.05 per Unit sold of Licensed Products within the Contract Territory payable to the **NFL Alumni
Northern California Chapter. Donated amounts will be allocated and dispersed to the Northern California Chapter
beginning on the first full quarter [three (3) month period] of the Agreement and continue on a quarterly basis
thereafter for the term of this Agreement. Where the following per Unit conversion shall apply for the term of this
Agreement:
perturbation.changed_text: A *donation of $0.05 per Unit sold of Licensed Products within the Contract Territory payable to the **NFL Alumni Northern California Chapter. Donated amounts will be allocated and dispersed to the Northern California Chapter beginning on the first full quarter [three (3) month period] of the Agreement and continue on a quarterly basis thereafter at the Company's discretion. Where the following per Unit conversion shall apply for the initial term of this Agreement:
perturbation.explanation: The original text states that donations will continue on a quarterly basis 'for the term of this agreement.' The modified version adds 'at the Company's discretion,' contradicting the original commitment for the entirety of the agreement. This introduces uncertainty about the duration of the donation commitment and allows the company to cease donations at any point.

perturbation.original_text:
*
The NFLA-NC will donate 15% of the above described proceeds to the NFLA.

**
The Company will provide to the NFLA-NC upon request the most recent quarterly sales report of the Company’s
Licensed Products.
perturbation.changed_text:
*
The NFLA-NC may donate up to 15% of the above described proceeds to the NFLA, dependent on budget availability.

**
The Company will endeavor to provide to the NFLA-NC upon request the most recent quarterly sales report of the Company’s Licensed Products, contingent upon internal resource availability.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states that NFLA-NC 'will donate 15%' creating an obligation. The modified text changes this to 'may donate up to 15% dependent on budget availability' removing the mandatory nature and introducing a condition. Also, the original text stated that the Company 'will provide' a sales report. The modified text changes this to 'will endeavor to provide' and adds the condition of 'contingent upon internal resource availability.' This contradiction undermines the duty to provide accurate sales reports.
